name: places/ChIJ0UCGvHxZwokRcGUGbz960Jo
formattedAddress: 597 W 44th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 597 W 44th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
I was very excited to try Creamline with their new Hell’s Kitchen location opening within Gotham Market. Ultimately, the burger and the waffle fries were simply… average. For a place that burgers and shakes, that’s simply unacceptable for me. Sorry.

The poppy seed bun was dry and tasted slightly stale. The double cheeseburger beef patties were also slightly dry. The sauce and the toppings on the burger really had to carry the flavor and texture, and were unfortunately too uneven to make up for the average overall burger experience… and for $14 for the burger itself (fyi the small quantity of waffle fries was $7), there are much better options that are a quick and easy door dash away (e.g., 7th Street Burger or ShakeShack)

The chocolate milkshake was quite good, but I just can’t get on board with the cardboard straws - no matter how bad it is for the environment to want plastic.

I might go back for a milkshake, but I’m going to pass on the burger next time.

originalText.text:
$30 for two cheeseburgers (no side)- was very underwhelming. Based on quality, would have gone elsewhere or a Shakeshack which I think is much better quality.

Also- most menu items were out of stock…

Also- most menu items were out of stock…

originalText.text: Great burger, been back a couple times already! In my mind the steakhouse burger is a Shake Shack burger (where the meat is the star), animal style (a la In N Out Burgers). I reluctantly give it four stars only because the bun isn't great. The buffalo chicken sandwich is also great (again despite the bun). The two cookie shake was great!!

I reluctantly give it four stars only because the bun isn't great. The buffalo chicken sandwich is also great (again despite the bun). The two cookie shake was great!!

originalText.text: The Buffalo chicken sandwich is amazing.   Very good waffle fries.  The service was awesome.   Definitely be back, maybe even tonight

text.text: The Buffalo chicken sandwich is amazing.   Very good waffle fries.  The service was awesome.   Definitely be back, maybe even tonight

originalText.text:
The DoorDash courier forgot our second bag of food, but no matter. Nick, the manager went absolutely above and beyond to ensure we were satisfied. They remade and hand delivered our food — wow, talk about AMAZING customer service. My roommate cannot eat seeds, he ensured that we got Texas toast instead of a seeded bun. Again, making sure we were satisfied.

I’ve not even mentioned the food. The buffalo chicken sandwich was probably the best I’ve had, still crispy and hot after being delivered. The honey milkshake was absolutely amazing. I cannot recommend this place enough…it may become a standard for my takeout experience. Bravo to the Creamline team. Y’all are amazing!!!
